mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`sku_id` as 'skuId', a.`goods_id` as 'goodsId', a.`prototype_specification_id` as 'prototypeSpecificationId', a.`prototype_specification_option_id` as 'prototypeSpecificationOptionId', a.`name` as 'name', a.`value` as 'value', a.`image_url` as 'imageUrl',
from `t_goods_sku_specification_value` as a
